name: hemangioma
definition: A cardiovascular organ benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in endothelial cells that line blood vessels and is characterised by increased number of normal or abnormal vessels filled with blood. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hemangioma]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase I trial, sensitivity to treatment with Rogaratinib (BAY 1163877) was demonstrated in patients with a variety of FGFR-expressing solid tumor types, including long lasting stable disease with resolution of edema in a patient with FGFR1-positive hemangioendothelioma (Ann Oncol 2017, Vol 28, Suppl 5, Abstract #379P; NCT01976741).

references.title: A novel mRNA-based patient selection strategy identifies fibroblast growth factor receptor (FGFR) inhibitor-sensitive tumors: Results from rogaratinib Phase-1 study

clinicalTrials.title: Multi-Arm Study to Test the Efficacy of Immunotherapeutic Agents in Multiple Sarcoma Subtypes
